title: Turkish Broker With 2,400% Stock Surge Reports Huge Profit Jump
description: Turkish brokerage Tera Yatirim Menkul Degerler AS, which has seen its share-price surge over the past year, reported a nearly 70-fold jump in profit for 2025.
content: Turkish brokerage Tera Yatirim Menkul Degerler AS, which has seen its share-price surge over the past year, reported a nearly 70-fold jump in profit for 2025.
